pdf:
<#if .locale == "zh_CN">
		
	<#elseif .locale == "zh_TW">
		
	<#elseif .locale == "ja_JP">
		
	<#elseif .locale == "ko_KR">
		
	<#elseif .locale == "th_TH">
		
	</#if>
    
        
             
				

					
						<#if record.subsidiary.logo?length != 0 >
							
						<#elseif companyInformation.logoUrl?length != 0 >
							
						</#if>
					
					
						
Item Fulfillment
						
						
Item Fulfillment #: ${record.tranid}
						
Date: ${record.trandate}
                      
Customer PO #: ${record.createdfrom.otherrefnum}
						
Sales Order #: ${record.createdfrom?keep_after('#')}
					
				
			
        
				

					
						
${record.subsidiary.name?keep_after(':')}
						<#if record.subsidiary.addr1?length != 0 >
							

								<#if record.subsidiary.addressee?has_content>${subsidiary.addressee}</#if>
								<#if record.subsidiary.addr1?has_content>${subsidiary.addr1},</#if>
								<#if record.subsidiary.addr2?has_content>${subsidiary.addr2},</#if>
								<#if record.subsidiary.city?has_content>${subsidiary.city},</#if>
								<#if record.subsidiary.state?has_content>${subsidiary.state},</#if>
								<#if record.subsidiary.zip?has_content>${subsidiary.zip},</#if>
								<#if record.subsidiary.country?has_content>${subsidiary.country}</#if>
							
						<#else>
							

								<#if companyInformation.addressee?has_content>${companyInformation.addressee},</#if>
								<#if companyInformation.addr1?has_content>${companyInformation.addr1},</#if>
								<#if companyInformation.addr2?has_content>${companyInformation.addr2},</#if>
								<#if companyInformation.city?has_content>${companyInformation.city},</#if>
								<#if companyInformation.state?has_content>${companyInformation.state},</#if>
								<#if companyInformation.zip?has_content>${companyInformation.zip},</#if>
								<#if companyInformation.country?has_content>${companyInformation.country}</#if>
							
						</#if>
						<#if record.subsidiary.custrecord_ss_anz_sub_phone?has_content>
							
P: ${subsidiary.custrecord_ss_anz_sub_phone} 
						<#else>
							
P: ${companyInformation.custrecord_ss_anz_sub_phone} 
						</#if>
						<#if record.subsidiary.custrecord_ss_anz_sub_email?has_content>
							
E: ${subsidiary.custrecord_ss_anz_sub_email}
						<#else>
							
E: ${companyInformation.custrecord_ss_anz_sub_email}
						</#if>
						<#if record.subsidiary.custrecord_ss_anz_sub_url?has_content>
							
W: ${subsidiary.custrecord_ss_anz_sub_url}
						<#else>
							
W: ${companyInformation.custrecord_ss_anz_sub_url}
						</#if>
						

							<#if record.subsidiary.country = "Australia">ABN:</#if>
							<#if record.subsidiary.country = "New Zealand">GST:</#if>
							${subsidiary.federalidnumber}
						
					
				
			
        
        
            
<#if preferences.PRINT_BARCODES>
	
	</#if>
	 of 
	
        
    
     

	
	<#assign hdr_height = record.subsidiary.custrecord_ss_anz_sub_hdr_hght >
	<#if hdr_height == 0>
		<#assign hdr_height = 29>
	</#if>
	

    

	${salesorder.shipaddress@label}
	
	

	${salesorder.shipaddress}
	



	${record.trandate@label}
	<#if record.subsidiary.addressee?has_content>${subsidiary.addressee}</#if>
  	<#if record.createdfrom.location?has_content>Location</#if>
	Sales Rep
  Memo
	
	

	${record.trandate}
    <#if record.createdfrom.location?has_content>${record.createdfrom.location}</#if>
	${salesorder.salesrep}
      ${salesorder.memo}
	
<#if record.item?has_content>



	

	Item
         Description
      	Line Memo
	
	Back Ordered
    Shipped
	

<#if record.showAddlItemsPackSlip == 'NONE'><#list record.item as item><#list salesorder.item as tranline><#if tranline.line==item.orderline>


	${tranline.custcol_f5_sale_itemcode}
${item.description}
    
    ${item.custcol_dce_linememo!''}

	${tranline.quantitybackordered}
  	${item.quantity}
	
	</#if></#list></#list><#elseif record.showAddlItemsPackSlip == 'ALL'><#list salesorder.item as tranline><#assign shipped=0><#list record.item as item><#if tranline.line==item.orderline><#assign shipped=item.quantity></#if></#list>
	

	${tranline.item}
${tranline.description}
	${tranline.quantity}
        
    ${item.custcol_dce_linememo!''}
	${tranline.quantitybackordered}
	${shipped}
	 
	 
	 
	
	</#list><#elseif record.showAddlItemsPackSlip == 'UNFULFILLED'><#list salesorder.item as tranline><#assign shipped=0><#assign isInList=false><#list record.item as item><#if tranline.line==item.orderline><#assign shipped=item.quantity><#assign isInList=true></#if></#list><#if isInList || tranline.quantitybackordered != 0>
	

	${tranline.item}
${tranline.description}
	${tranline.quantity}
        
    ${item.custcol_dce_linememo!''}
	${tranline.quantitybackordered}
	${shipped}
	 
	 
	 
	
	</#if></#list></#if>
</#if><#if preferences.RETURNFORM && returnForm??>

</#if>
